block.p: 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 2,250-sq.-ft. co-op in century-old loft building; new elevator; 13-ft. ceilings, oak floors, fireplace; maintenance $1,100, 51% tax-deductible; listed at $1.025 million, 5 weeks on market (brokers: Siim Hanja Ltd.; Eychner Associates)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 2,250-sq.-ft. co-op in century-old loft building; new elevator; 13-ft. ceilings, oak floors, fireplace; maintenance $1,100, 51% tax-deductible; listed at $1.025 million, 5 weeks on market (brokers: Siim Hanja Ltd.; Eychner Associates)

2-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,175-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in prewar loft building; 13-ft. beamed ceilings, 3 fireplaces, balcony; 600-sq.-ft. garden; maintenance $2,242, 66% tax-deductible; listed at $1.195 million, 20 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. condo in postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, manned elevator, health club in building; hardwood floors; common charge $704; taxes $4,092; listed at $640,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; dining area, renovated kitchen, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,200, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $550,000, 1 week on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,650-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; 24-hr. doormen; eat-in kitchen, southern exposure, maintenance $1,250, 47% tax-deductible; listed at $849,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

4-family, 4-story, 120-year-old brick house; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room, original moldings and detail in each unit; rear garden, 22-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,400; listed at $850,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (broker: Harbor View Realty)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in brownstone; stained-glass windows, French doors, high ceilings, hardwood floors, fireplace; maintenance $570, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $325,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

2-family, 65-year-old brick house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen, rear deck in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; hospitality suite in finished basement; 17-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,700; listed at $550,000, 1 week on market (broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 80-year-old brick colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, study, fireplace, finished basement, whirlpool bath; 4-car driveway, 89-by-100-ft. corner lot; taxes $4,200; listed at $999,000, 1 week on market (broker: ReMax/F. H. Realty)

4-bedroom, 3-bath, 13-year-old brick colonial; 2-story entry, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, library, whirlpool bath, 2 fireplaces; 2-car garage, 125-by-100-ft. irregular lot; taxes $3,178; listed at $599,000, 22 weeks on market (broker: Linda Nasta Realty)

6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 140-year-old Victorian; dining room, den, 2 maids' rooms, 3 fireplaces, powder room; in-ground pool, 2-car garage, 2.8-acre lot; taxes $11,140; listed at $859,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Larchmont)

6-bedroom, 25-year-old colonial; 4 full and 2 half baths, eat-in kitchen, living room with cathedral ceilings, library, finished basement, exercise room, central air-conditioning; terrace, heated pool, 3-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $14,815; listed at $2.295 million, 5 weeks on market (brokers: O'Brien & Associates; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)
